title: Android (robot)
summary: An android is a humanoid robot[1] or other artificial being[2][3][4] often made from a flesh-like material[2] and, particularly in contrast to gynoids, made to have masculine appearence. Historically, androids were completely within the domain of science fiction and frequently seen in film and television, but recent advances in robot technology now allow the design of functional and realistic[5] humanoid robots.[6]
